org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class PurgeHistoricalUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
      • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.PurgeHistoricalUserData

  • public class PurgeHistoricalUserData
extends ReplicationUserData
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user to purge historical data.

        Returns:
        true if the task will be executed on an online server and false otherwise.

      • getTaskSchedule

        public TaskScheduleUserData getTaskSchedule()

        the object describing the schedule of the task.
